title: Beyond Friends
description: What happens when best friends spend a week at a romantic couple’s resort in the tropics? Things get way hotter than either expected. Arielle’s reeling after being dumped before finals and her ex left her with two tickets to paradise. Dean’s a friend, a big flirt and a small-town mechanic with the right tools to mend her broken heart. Insert tequila, a determined ex, the Mexican police, and life will never be the same.  This BBW and blue collar romance novella includes no cheating, no cliffhangers, but there will be plenty of tropical heat, and a happily ever after guaranteed to make you smile.
author: Kristen Echo
